subject: Mental Health
title: Trauma and Eating Disorders
description: A fast breakdown of Trauma and Eating Disorders for builders.

hook.text: Up to 50 percent of people with eating disorders report a history of trauma.

buildup.text: Sexual abuse, physical abuse, and emotional neglect are strongly linked to eating disorders.

discovery.text: Controlling food becomes a way to manage overwhelming emotions from unprocessed trauma.

twist.text: The eating disorder numbs pain â€” restriction starves feelings, bingeing buries them.

climax.text: Trauma-informed treatment addresses the root wound, not just the eating behaviors.

punchline.text: The eating disorder is the symptom. The trauma is the cause.

quiz.question: What percentage of people with eating disorders report trauma history?
